description: Your summertime celebrations have met their match with tasty prawn, avocado and sweet chilli crostinis â€“ best enjoyed with a cold drink in hand.
name: Prawn, Avocado & Sweet Chilli Crostini Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5ml extra virgin olive oil cooking spray
2 Woolworths Crafted pointed sourdough baguettes, cut diagonally into 1.5cm thick slices
1 head gem lettuce, leaves separated, torn
20 extra large cooked tiger prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact

recipeInstructions.text: Place avocado in a small bowl and mash until almost smooth. Juice 1 lime. Add lime juice and season with pepper. Stir until well combined.

Heat a chargrill pan over mediumhigh heat. Spray each side of bread with oil. Cook, in batches, for 1-2 minutes each side or until golden and lightly charred. Transfer to a board and rub with cut sides of garlic cloves.

Spread each piece of bread with avocado mixture. Top with a few pieces of lettuce followed by a prawn. Drizzle with a little sweet chilli sauce and season with pepper. Sprinkle with coriander leaves. Cut remaining lime into wedges. Serve lime wedges with crostini.
